title: Make an actual Window.Closed Event for Uwp for desktop
body: right now the window.closed event for desktop fires both for minimization and for closing events.

comments.body: Agree; this is really important for a desktop application and 100% the common convention, that an application prompts the user to save changes or cancel exit. It is quite common to NOT want to save changes; for example the user made a big mistake and just wants to go have lunch - saving automatically every time and app is closed, is not the right solution.
